name: Google Maps Click'n Load for Divi (GDPR)
author: 4ley

sections.description:
The Maps Click’n Load Plugin prevents the automatic load of Google Maps scripts and waits for an active user click to activate the interactive map.

How it works

The slim plugin code simply hooks into the “script_loader_tag” filter and adds code to defer the script execution.

sections.installation:
Upload, activate and done. Once active, Maps Click’n Load will automatically defer Google Maps until the user actively agrees.

More info on how to install WordPress plugins

screenshots.caption: Goole Maps was deferred and the user sees a placeholder.
